Class MonkeyPerception

java.lang.Object
  monkeyworld.core.agent.MonkeyPerception
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.oreilly.is.Percept
public class MonkeyPerception
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.oreilly.is.Percept

This is the perception that the monkey receives from the environment.

Author:
Deep Blue Team
